name: Grave Robber
description:
Grave Robber is a super challenging and addictive arcade game, where you'll face hordes on enemies including zombies, skeletons, ghosts, and vampires, all vying to stop you from achieving the highest score possible.

Armed with only your wits and lightning-fast reactions, you'll need to make way through treacherous monsters, all while collecting precious coins to boost your score.

With its pixel-art aesthetic and retro-inspired soundtrack, Grave Robber is a true homage to the classic arcade games of yesteryear. But don't be fooled by its charming appearance - this game is a true test of your skill and determination, requiring laser-sharp focus and split-second decision-making.
